statements: DELETE FROM user_data WHERE is_cyberbully = true AND is_victim = false;
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1 AND is_cyberbully = TRUE;
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE is_victim = FALSE AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id1 = 101 AND user_id2 = 102;
DELETE FROM posts WHERE user_id = 201 AND post_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM messages WHERE timestamp < NOW() - interval '1 week';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE report_text LIKE '%bullying%';
